headline: Sam Altman defends AI resource usage: Water concerns 'fake,' and 'humans use energy too'
summary: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman defended the resource use of AI on Friday, arguing that water concerns were "fake" and comparing it to human energy use.

raw.headline: Sam Altman defends AI resource usage: Water concerns 'fake,' and 'humans use energy too'
raw.summary: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman defended the resource use of AI on Friday, arguing that water concerns were "fake" and comparing it to human energy use.
